foreignData.name: Doppelstudium
foreignData.text: Kopiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl, den du kontrollierst, außer dass die Kopie nicht legendär ist, falls der Zauberspruch legendär ist.

foreignData.name: Doble grado
foreignData.text: Copia el hechizo de criatura objetivo que controlas, excepto que no es legendario si el hechizo es legendario.

foreignData.name: Double spécialisation
foreignData.text: Copiez un sort de créature ciblé que vous contrôlez, excepté qu'il n'est pas légendaire si le sort est légendaire.

foreignData.name: Doppia Specializzazione
foreignData.text: Copia una magia creatura bersaglio che controlli, tranne che non è leggendaria se la magia è leggendaria.

foreignData.name: 二科目専攻
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー・呪文１つを対象とする。その呪文が伝説であってもコピーは伝説でないことを除き、それをコピーする。

name: Double Major
originalText: Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary.

rulings.text: If a creature spell is copied, it’s put onto the battlefield as a token as the spell resolves rather than putting the copy of the spell onto the battlefield. The rules that apply to a permanent spell becoming a permanent apply to a copy of a spell becoming a token.
The token that a resolving copy of a spell becomes isn’t said to have been “created.”

text: Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)
